alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 15 at 7:43PM CDT until June 15 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Cooke County in north central Texas... Southwestern Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Gainesville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Callisburg around 755 PM CDT. Lake Kiowa around 805 PM CDT. Whitesboro around 810 PM CDT. Collinsville around 820 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Dixie, Ethel, Woodbine, Sadler, Tioga, Southmayd and Lake Ray Roberts. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 494 and 503. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
